title: (38500) Güímar - 12 Calle Anton Guanche
description: Well leveled parking on a small plot with views of some of the Güímar pyramids. Attached to the enclosure of these. Containers at the entrance.

title: (38500) Güímar -
description: Service area, DISA gas station. black and gray water drainage, the closest I have found to Santa Cruz de Tenerife. water load and washing of the van, maximum height 2.90 ms since the laundry room no longer admits height. You must buy tokens at the service station, the washing token, with two tokens there is enough to wash the van.

title: (38560) Güímar - 2 Camino Anocheza
description:
Nice to spend the day or night
nice view of the valley

title: (38509) Arafo - 2 Paseo Valle Guimar M IV
title_short: (38509) Arafo - 2 Paseo Valle Guimar M IV
description: Repsol petrol station. Has water, air, fuel and motorhome washing.

title: (38508) Puertito de Güímar - Avenida Ingeniero Manuel González
title_short: (38508) Puertito de Güímar - Avenida Ingeniero Manuel González
description: Parking only motorhomes. 9 seats more or less, online. Supermarket at 20m. Very close to the center. Beach for dogs south of the promenade.

title: (38508) Güímar - 3 Calle Américo Vespucio
description: Parking for motorhomes, maximum 72 hours, hardly any cars pass by, the air does not hit, park where it says motorhomes.

title: (38508) Puertito de Güímar - 18 Paseo de las Palmeras
title_short: (38508) Puertito de Güímar - 18 Paseo de las Palmeras
description: Parking with areas facing the beach. with part for dog beach. sure to stay. very respectful people.

title: (38508) Güímar - 6A Calle Bajas
description: Parking in front of the sea near the yacht club at the end of the port. A dozen possible places. The place is very nice and much better located than the official car park along the street and no view. As on other car parks do not install anything outside the motorhome.

title: (38508) El Socorro - 59 Calle Piedra Estila
description: Entrance beach

title: (38550) Arafo - 52 Diseminado el Pinarete
description: Parking in the Los Frailes leisure area. Does not require authorization. Narrow and climbing road to access it and magnificent view at the top.

title: (38509) Candelaria - 20 Calle la Magdalena
description: Ample parking to spend day and night with van or caravans. Near the beach and shops.

title: (38509) Candelaria - 1 Calle las Vichas
description: DISA petrol station with LPG, staff help with filling up with LPG, campers are not turned away, Euronozzle adapters are available at the column

title: (38509) Candelaria - 13 Calle la Piscina
description: Easy parking next to the swimming pool without infrastructure right on the water

title: (38530) Candelaria - 5A Calle Batayola
description: Laundry room with coin operated washers and dryers. It is very close to the parking area for Motorhomes and Campers. Hours from 08:00 to 21:00 every day

title: (38509) Candelaria - 14C Calle Batayola
description: Good place to park quiet day or night very central serves all services

title: (38530) Candelaria - 10 Rambla de los Menceyes
description: Parking area on land to meet and spend the night near Candelaria. There is a commercial mailman.

title: (38509) Candelaria -
description: Our favorite spot in Tenerife. This place is so beautiful and peaceful. The view is unbeatable. We never saw anyone every time we went there.

title: (38530) Candelaria - 16 Rambla de los Menceyes
description: Self-service laundry with dryers and washing machines.

title: (38530) Candelaria - 8 Avenida Maritima
description: Free parking with sea views right on the promenade to stand up during the day and night. Basilica of Candelaria and historic center within walking distance. We confessed here one night. Although it was on the street it was quiet.

title: (38310) Aguamansa -
description: A place found at random, we spent the night there in a van. when you walk in the forest you discover a breathtaking view of el teide. no network but a place in the middle of nature without noise and very good to spend some time there

title: (38591) La Puente - 37 Carretera la Puente
description: Faucet with low flow not drinkable but practical because small car park

title: (38550) Arafo - Carretera de la Esperanza
description: It is the parking lot of the Chipeque viewpoint, from which there are incredible views of the Teide and a walk through the pine forest. The parking lot is flat and has bins. People come to watch the sunset, the rest of the day is quiet (weekdays). You are inside a protected area.

title: (38520) Igueste de Candelaria -
description: Very quiet, end of road. Magnificent high view of the city and the ocean.

title: (38530) Candelaria - 196 Avenida Maritima
description: Laundry open from 7 to 22

title: (38310) Aguamansa - Carr. de la Esperanza
description: Magnificent point of view

title: (38310) Aguamansa - Unnamed Road
description: A layover above the clouds with a very nice view of Gran Canaria and the sea. The ranger advised us not to have any tables or chairs outside and to pay attention to the plants. We spent one night here, very quiet!

name: Camping La caldera
title: (38310) Camping La caldera
description: La caldera camping area, camping site with authorization from the Tenerife council. place surrounded by nature without nearby services.

title: (38300) La Orotava - Unnamed Road
description: Large car park with wide spaces. Crowded during the day . ideal for going on a hike in the Corona Forestal Park

title: (38570) Izaña -
description: Comfortable semi-platform on the side of the road from the observatory entrance. Perfect view for sunrise and sunset in the winter. View on Grand Canaria and Teine Mountain.

title: (38570) - 863 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking in a beautiful spot on top of a small volcano. A nice quiet place with the possibility of starting paragliding. Not recommended with a lot of wind, which is normal in that place.

title: (38290) Las Barreras -
description: Large dirt car park surrounded by nature right next to Forestal Park Tenerife. Nothing fancy but quiet, with shade and at the crossroads of several hiking trails. The adventure park is right next door and it's a great activity to do with the family. Possible to sleep there at night, no prohibition sign.

title: (38530) Candelaria - Autop. del Sur
description: Flat large parking on gravel, straight next to the highway. Quite quiet given the fact its next to the road. Nice view and dirty, nothing special here. But close to Tabaiba and LaLaguna

title: (38570) Fasnia - Av. Los Roques
description: Petrol station where you can dispose grey water and get a fresh one. Getting fresh water takes some time, but beter than bottles. Containers for separated waste nearby. Cafe at the petrol station.

title: (38310) Pinolere - 34A Calle Germinal
description: Very nice, a quiet area in the parking lot of the Ethnological Museum. Edge of the village of Pinolere, on the road to Mount Teide Natural Park.

title: (38570) Fasnia - 18 Calle B 23
description: Parking in a very quiet street and on the 1st line of the sea to see a good sunrise. Some 7/8 well-leveled parking spaces, where there are several devices to do some moderate exercise. Just up the street is a gas station with restrooms, a car wash and a couple of restaurants. Good beach 2 min walk

title: (38570) Los Roques - 34 Carretera los Roques
description: Quiet place to spend the night…. Well leveled and very wide. It is right on top of a very nice and quiet stone beach, with a shower .. Nearby there is another sandy beach, gas station and restaurants .. A luxury place to spend a couple of days

title: (38579) Arico Aldea Fuente Nueva - Camino La Montaña 22
title_short: (38579) Arico Aldea Fuente Nueva - Camino La Montaña 22
description: Camping La Montaña is located at an altitude of 1100 m, surrounded by pure Nature. A place where you can enjoy wonderful views of the sea and the Mount Total disconnection, hiking, resting from the world noise It consists of tables, kitchenette, barbecue, bathroom, water for hygiene of kitchen items Recycling containers. parking. Silence and nature await you.

title: (38290) Las Barreras - 13 Calle las Barreras
description: Might have to be a bit creative to level your camper but the view is fantastic. Few different places around that point you can park and no one to bother you there.

title: (38300) La Orotava - TF-21
description: Nice quiet vantage point day and night, with room for 5-7 vehicles

title: (38290) La Matanza de Acentejo - Carretera de la Esperanza
title_short: (38290) La Matanza de Acentejo - Carretera de la Esperanza
description:
Camping area, site that belongs to the City Council of Santa Cruz de Tenerife, you must ask a free permission to spend the night in the official page of the Cabildo de Tenerife, authorize the caravans. 
This site is a piece of the history of Spain at the beginning of the Spanish Civil War.

title: (38300) La Orotava - TF-21
description: Recreation area with (non-potable) water, several barbecue areas and public toilets. Bathing hours 10-17. you can stay in the area until sunset. near the road but nobody goes by at night

title: (38109) Radazul - 4 Avenida Colón
description: Place with a lot of people during the day, but very quiet at night, plenty of parking. Walking area. You can go to Tabaiba by an accessible road. Bathing area accessible also for all kinds of people, you can enter by stairs or by sandy beach. Restaurants nearby, store to buy what you need. An ideal place to stay.

title: (38300) La Orotava - 3 TF-21
description: Gas station with vacuum cleaners and guns to clean. Where the vacuum cleaners are, there is water.

title: (38300) La Orotava - 44C Camino Cruz de las Cebollas
title_short: (38300) La Orotava - 44C Camino Cruz de las Cebollas
description: Very quiet place to spend the night and visit the historic center of La Orotava, ideal if you are on your way to Mount Teide. It has shade, the health center right next door.

title: (38109) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 66 Urbanizacion Costa Caricia
title_short: (38109) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 66 Urbanizacion Costa Caricia
description: Large parking lot next to a small beach. You can stay there overnight, but the showers on the beach were unfortunately not in use. There is a supermarket with public toilets in the village next door. The descent with the caravan looks a bit adventurous, but it worked well because the road is well paved. Right next to the motorway, but still without car noise :)

title: (38300) La Orotava - 6 Calle Educadora Lucía Mesa
title_short: (38300) La Orotava - 6 Calle Educadora Lucía Mesa
description: Public car park in La Orotava. Spent a quiet night there. You have a nice view over the city. However, you have to watch out for the dog poo.

title: (38300) La Orotava - 27 Calle Domingo Dominguez Luis
title_short: (38300) La Orotava - 27 Calle Domingo Dominguez Luis
description: 3 parking spaces terraced one above the other, (almost) even. In 5 minutes you are in the center of the beautiful city of La Orotava. Also suitable for an overnight stay (no facilities)

title: (38300) La Orotava - 18 Plaza Cruz del Teide
title_short: (38300) La Orotava - 18 Plaza Cruz del Teide
description: Quiet land parking, a little uneven area, 5 minutes walk from the center to visit the Marquesado Gardens of the Quinta Roja, Hijuela del Botánico Garden or have a coffee at Casa Lercaro

title: (38570) Las Eras - 5A Calle Eras B
description: Gravel place on the outskirts, small supermarket right next door. The bay of Las Eras is a great diving area and also recommended for snorkeling.

title: (38359) Ravelo - Unnamed Road
description:
This is a good camping spot and picnic area. There are plenty of picnic tables, drinking water supplies, fireplaces, and even working sinks. I had a really quiet two nights in my truck here. In the morning you can enjoy the singing of the birds. I also recommend taking a walk in the woods. Although there is no sign.
To camp you must reserve.

title: (38390) Santa Úrsula - 5 Avenida las Palmeras
description: Public parking next to Lidl, ideal for spending the day in Santa Úrsula, strolling along the cliffs and eating at some delicious Guachinche, there are several very good ones in the area.

title: (38390) Santa Úrsula - 84 Carretera Provincial
description: Automatic laundry. Washers and dryers available. Payment in cash or bank card

title: (38300) Las Cañadas del Teide - Carr. de la Esperanza
title_short: (38300) Las Cañadas del Teide - Carr. de la Esperanza
description: 6/7 parking spaces. Very nice point of view with access to a nice little easy hike. The parking lot is not flat.

title: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 2D Urbanizacion las Eras
title_short: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 2D Urbanizacion las Eras
description: No official parking lot, local anglers are out there. "Roads" are stony and sandy, nothing for every camper. Wonderful view in every direction, the motorway was quiet at night and was drowned out by the sound of the sea. Very pleasant option for one night. No service.

title: (38290) La Esperanza - 32 Diseminado Sino el Cl
title_short: (38290) La Esperanza - 32 Diseminado Sino el Cl
description: Convenient parking to park with a large vehicle and walk around La Esperanza but without charm. Just good free parking. Poste, Superdino and the little wood of Adelantado.

title: (38370) La Matanza de Acentejo - 181 Carretera General del Norte
title_short: (38370) La Matanza de Acentejo - 181 Carretera General del Norte
description: On this road, from La Matanza to La Victoria de Acentejo, there are several areas attached to the road where you can park the motorhome and be able to visit and learn about the surrounding towns. Although overnight can be somewhat annoying because of traffic. Everything depends on the tolerance to noise.

title: (38314) La Orotava - 53 Calle San Diego de Alcala
title_short: (38314) La Orotava - 53 Calle San Diego de Alcala
description: Parking for a restaurant, is 10 minutes from Playa El Bollullo, we have used the very clean bathroom. One-lane road not suitable for large cars, we passed in an Opel Combo Life without any problem. We did not spend the night there is a lot of space but in general uneven. Quiet place you can hear the sea.

title: (38314) La Orotava - 19 Camino San Bartolomé
description: Pretty peacefull street side parking. At the moment (4/2022) abandoned construction site next to it. Near this place, there is many more this kind place

title: (38370) La Matanza de Acentejo - 180 Carretera General
title_short: (38370) La Matanza de Acentejo - 180 Carretera General
description: LPG at Disa

title: (38400) El Durazno - 16 Camino Casa Grande
description: Drinking water source, 30L in approximately 19 minutes, you can put all the water you want, nobody will tell you anything, just respect if someone wants to drink so as not to make them wait.

title: (38390) Santa Úrsula - 30 Calle el Muelle
description: Quite roadside parking with a view of Puerto de la Cruz and sunsets.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 10 Calle Doctor Celestino Glez Pad
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 10 Calle Doctor Celestino Glez Pad
description: Here at the Shell petrol station you can fill up with Water at a machine.

title: (38111) Santa María del Mar - 33 Calle Guaire
title_short: (38111) Santa María del Mar - 33 Calle Guaire
description: Right near the local supermarket and Lidl. On the way to the Volcano. Here's a great view.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 49 Calle Aceviño
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 49 Calle Aceviño
description: Large flat parking spaces. Possibility of swimming along the coastal promenade.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 6 Calle Azucena
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 6 Calle Azucena
description: Dead end street, quiet, between apartments, shady places, flat and with a shopping center 100 meters away, with a bakery, cafeteria, bathrooms, etc.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 132 Carretera General Puerto Cruz - Arenas
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 132 Carretera General Puerto Cruz - Arenas
description: Service station with the possibility of filling water

title: (38111) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 48I Urbanizacion de Añaza
title_short: (38111) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 48I Urbanizacion de Añaza
description: Good flat land in a vast and very quiet vacant lot, no services, basketball and football fields, located in front of the sea and possibility to take a bath with a safe entrance to the water with stairs and even a ramp to get off the small boats .. 15 minutes from the center of Santa Cruz de Tenerife.

title: (38400) La Cruz - 59a Calle Camelia
description: Self-service laundry. the laundry is perfectly washed in half an hour. they also have large washing machines and enough dryers. the same is shopping center is a very good supermarket and opposite the botanical garden.

title: (38111) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 39N Avenida Luis Celso García Guadalupe
title_short: (38111) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 39N Avenida Luis Celso García Guadalupe
description: Gad station with water.

title: (38379) La Matanza de Acentejo - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38379) La Matanza de Acentejo - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place with a beautiful view. Visited by hikers during the day. Swimming is very dangerous at high tide, I advise against it! Access only suitable for small campers! Very narrow single lane road, hardly any evasive options and very bumpy. Unfortunately a bit dirty place.

title: (38379) El Caletón - 36 Carretera el Caleton
description: Very nice parking for a maximum of 2 campers with a direct view of the sea. Parking lot is sloping. Approach is very steep but paved. No services (please take rubbish with you)

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 1 Camino de la Sortija
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 1 Camino de la Sortija
description: Conventional parking, of the park of the ring. Full in the morning, plenty of room in the afternoon. Attention! The squares are in battery, maximum about 5.5 meters long. At the back of the car park there are 2-3 spaces in line where a longer vehicle could park. Spend a very quiet night from Monday to Tuesday. Water fountain in the corner. In a walk of less than 10 minutes you are in the historic center. The park is well cared for, with areas for sports, playgrounds and dog walking.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 12 Avenida Familia de Betancourt y Molina
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 12 Avenida Familia de Betancourt y Molina
description: Great place to do laundry while traveling. Parking near the waterfront (also on P4N) also for large motorhomes. washing included

address.street: 12 Avenida Familia de Betancourt y Molina

title: (38589) Arico el Nuevo - 22 Calle Veinticinco De julio
title_short: (38589) Arico el Nuevo - 22 Calle Veinticinco De julio
description: Small gravel parking lot for about 1-2 vehicles with sea views below the beautiful town of Arico El Nuevo.

title: (38360) El Sauzal - Calle de Rojas
description: For small campers as the road is steep, winding and very narrow but in excellent condition. Great spot by the sea. Not level.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 22 Calle Josè de Arroyo
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 22 Calle Josè de Arroyo
description: Busy part of town and a bit noisy to sleep but safe and decent size parking space more than 5.5mt

title: (38350) Tacoronte - 79 Carretera General del Norte
description: Gas station with public toilets outside. They have water tap available here. Also the gas station has good sortiment of goods - bakery, groceries etc. Recommended!

title: (38419) Los Realejos - TF-320
description: Area equipped with barbecue tables and benches. There is a bar with bathrooms which is open from Tuesday to Sunday from 10:00 to 20:00. Free parking spaces that offer the possibility of sleeping on the spot.

title: (38589) -
description: Recreational Area El Contador

title: (38588) Porís de Abona - 4 Calle Chopino
description: Public parking with beaches, supermarket and nearby restaurants.

title: (38350) Tacoronte - 16F Calle de Teobaldo Power
description: Tacoronte public car park. Right next to a sports park and dog training area. Hiperdino can be reached via a beaten path. There are toilets there. Churroria for breakfast nearby. Police station too. In the morning the parking lot fills up and the neighborhoods start crowing.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 136T Calle Mequinez
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 136T Calle Mequinez
description: Large free parking on the shore. Great location, if you'd like to discover the city. No toilets or showers. Few supermarkets in 5 min by walk. Large parking space in front of the sea

title: (38417) Los Realejos -
description: Gas station TGAS La Gorvorana, in Los Realejos. They have just installed a system for emptying and filling the tanks, installed by the company DepurAguas.

title: (38360) El Sauzal - Calle Tajinaste, 22
description: Public car park/gravel lot and very quiet at night. Beautiful view of the Atlantic.

title: (38417) Los Realejos - 87 Calle el Toscal
description: Parking above Lidl, beautiful sunset

title: (38360) El Sauzal - 52 Calle Saucan 3
description: Right next to the view point that is closed during the night. Plain parking lot near the neighbourhood. Busy during the day but suitable for spending the night. Restaurants nearby.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 7 Calle de la Canoa
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 7 Calle de la Canoa
description: Spacy parking spots close to Loro Park. Side street, where not bothering anyone.

title: (38110) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 325 Carretera General del Rosario
title_short: (38110) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 325 Carretera General del Rosario
description: Here we could fill our gas tank. At the Disa petrol stations we had to continue driving everywhere, because gas filling up there is only allowed for the engine.

title: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 49 Calle de la Canoa
title_short: (38400) Puerto de la Cruz - 49 Calle de la Canoa
description: Parking near the football stadium. 10 minutes walk from Loro Park and not far from the Ldl. Front sea view. No services but convenient for sleeping. Busy during the day.

title: (38410) Los Realejos - 40D Calle San Isidro
description: We spent the day on the ground next to the municipal swimming pool, a few cars passing by but generally quite calm, no one when we arrived, but cars coming to park there :)

title: (38108) La Laguna - 20 Calle Santa Amelia
description: Service station. Emptying of gray-black water and filling with drinking water. Washing motorhomes with pressurized water. Laundry. Upholstery washing, pet washing, cafeteria, butane-propane cylinders and shop. Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (38588) Arico - Buenviaje - Desvío a mitad de camino entre Poris y Punta de Abona
title_short: (38588) Arico - Buenviaje - Desvío a mitad de camino entre Poris y Punta de Abona
description: By the sea. Usually windy. Quiet and apart. 40 meters on a dusty road and you are there

address.street: Buenviaje - Desvío a mitad de camino entre Poris y Punta de Abona

title: (38358) Tacoronte - 29 Calle del Poniente
description: Large earthen parking lot, flat, accessible by small streets that pass by motorhome.

title: (38589) - Unnamed Road
description: Worthy of an Indiana Jones film set in a deep throat. The way is dead end but there is enough room to turn around at the end of the path. Only in dry weather and not for those who feel dizzy. The ground is not flat so good wedges are needed. Very calm and superb at sunrise.

title: (38300) La Orotava - Ctra. de las Canadas del Teide
title_short: (38300) La Orotava - Ctra. de las Canadas del Teide
description: Parking next to the road with a view of the moonscape. Quite flat.

address.street: Ctra. de las Canadas del Teide

title: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Calle Buenviaje
title_short: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Calle Buenviaje
description: Free parking without services there is a beach

title: (38588) Punta de Abona - 20 Calle Punta de Abona
title_short: (38588) Punta de Abona - 20 Calle Punta de Abona
description: Ample parking to spend the day near the beach

title: (38588) - Carretera El Faro
description: From the town of El Poris towards the lighthouse there is a huge esplanade with flat areas. To get there, you just have to cross the town and take an asphalt road that later turns into a track that is in very good condition. It is a quiet area although in the morning some walkers and people come to bathe in the coves of the cliff. The downside is that it can be a very windy area

title: (38412) Realejo Bajo - 5 Calle Cantillo Abajo
description: Good place to park..

title: (38108) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 108 Carretera General la Cuesta
title_short: (38108) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 108 Carretera General la Cuesta
description: DISA station only allow you to refuel gasoline.

title: (38589) La Sabinita - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place between the pine trees. Incredible silence and birdsong. Challenging approach, 2WD possible, ground clearance recommended.

title: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Carretera El Faro
title_short: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Carretera El Faro
description: Beautiful place to stay. You should drive there very carefully, the path is full of large stones and hills that you can quickly touch down on. You can go swimming about 500m away at a swimming area. The ghost town of Abades is within walking distance.

title: (38206) La Laguna - 197 Camino la Villa
description: Next to the airport, along a fairly quiet road. Space to park.

title: (38296) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 314 Calle Oro del Risco
title_short: (38296) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 314 Calle Oro del Risco
description: Wide parking area close to the city centre

title: (38010) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 3 Calle Domingo Madan
title_short: (38010) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 3 Calle Domingo Madan
description: Parking only but very quiet. near tram and supermarket. You have a nearby park with several fountains where you can replenish your water, a canodromo, playground, tables and a good place to relax. It also has a Mercadona supermarket, health center and a nearby shopping center where there is a cafeteria with hamburgers or mixed dishes or where to have a coffee.

title: (38009) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 69 Carretera General del Rosario
title_short: (38009) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 69 Carretera General del Rosario
description: Spacious parking. 800m from the hospital. Some trees with shade. Bus stop nearby.

title: (38320) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 45 Carretera Sur
title_short: (38320) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 45 Carretera Sur
description: Parking located halfway between Santa Cruz de Tenerife and San Cristobal de la Laguna, just 50 meters from the light rail stop (L2) L1 connects Santa Cruz with La Laguna, either take L2 and transfer or It walks to the L1 which is a 12-minute walk away... Very large paved parking with a slope (nothing that is not acceptable) In the park next door there is a playground and most importantly a fountain to drink water or carry bottles .

title: (38414) Los Realejos - Unnamed Road
description:
Bongo viewpoint overlooking the Orotava valley. perfect place to see the stars .
parking spaces 2.
place to spend the night, quiet and away from the population.

title: (38588) Abades - 2 Calle 16 de Mayo
description: Abades  Parken in Natur gegebener Umgebung

title: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 77 Avenida de los Menceyes
title_short: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 77 Avenida de los Menceyes
description: Very quiet spacious apartment next to supermarkets

title: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 69 Avenida de los Menceyes
title_short: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 69 Avenida de los Menceyes
description: Very quiet and central parking all very close to bakery pharmacy supermarkets

title: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 6 Camino Finca España
title_short: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 6 Camino Finca España
description: Quiet place very central to enter a little difficult because it is dirt vehicles with high tires are recommended

title: (38300) La Orotava -
description: Slightly sloping car park next to a fairly busy road during the day. Without services, spaces are scarce during the day but are available early in the afternoon. But, the perfect place to rest for a few hours before starting an ascent to Teide at night Attention: It is the mountain, plan to face the cold according to the season

title: (38588) Abades - Avenida Vera de Candelaria
description: Parking max. 72H. restaurants (best pizzas at Amichi), small supermarket, beach shower, trails, etc. Busy spot specially in weekends. extra parking spots available between restaurants and supermarket. No camping equipment can be displayed.

title: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 153 Avenida de los Menceyes
title_short: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 153 Avenida de los Menceyes
description: Parking day and night very quiet and close to supermarkets pharmacies bakery restaurants

title: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 33 Pasaje el Dátil
title_short: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 33 Pasaje el Dátil
description: Very central parking with plenty of space all close to banks supermarkets bakery hardware store bazaar etc all walking

title: (38320) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 292 Avenida de los Menceyes
title_short: (38320) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 292 Avenida de los Menceyes
description: Laundry with 5 washing machines and 4 dryers. Parking near the post office.

title: (38358) Tacoronte - 142 Calle Mesa del Mar
description: Free parking there are no services. There are showers on the beach. There is a bar. The climb path is difficult. Do it if you have a good motor

title: (38203) La Laguna - 6 Calle Girasol
description: Close to the city center, easy entry for motorhomes..

title: (38588) Abades -
description:
Peaceful bush park. Needs some courage to drive on sandy road but we managed well with 6,2m van.
1,2km walk to nearby beach. Good trails nearby.

title: (38416) Los Realejos - 10 Carretera Bajada Playa Socorro
title_short: (38416) Los Realejos - 10 Carretera Bajada Playa Socorro
description: Good beach with views. Bathrooms and showers from the beach. Quiet zone. It closes from 10pm to 6am.

title: (38203) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 58 Calle de la Retama
title_short: (38203) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 58 Calle de la Retama
description: Large and free parking 10 minutes walk from the center. Sloping sites and other plans.

title: (38205) La Laguna - 7 Camino la Piterita
description: Clean_Go self-service laundry with two dryers and three washing machines

title: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 44 Calle las Nieves
title_short: (38205) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 44 Calle las Nieves
description: A quiet place to spend the night undisturbed

title: (38300) La Orotava - TF-21
description: Nice parking lot to stay, before you want to hike Teide early in the morning. The cable car station is about 2 km away and if you want to go up, you only have to walk about 1 km in the opposite direction of Montaña Blanca. The view is great, buildings like the starry sky. You cannot stay overnight at any point in the Teide National Park. The forest guards throw you out. In the event that the night guard does not see you, the morning guard fines you.

title: (38003) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 12 Avenida la Constitución
title_short: (38003) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 12 Avenida la Constitución
description: Parking area to meet and visit the wonderful city of Santa Cruz de Tenerife. Ample parking lot close to the International Center of Fairs and Congresses and the Maritime Park, where WC services exist

title: (38358) El Pris - Ctra el Pris
description: Very quiet place .. during the day in summer difficult parking, in the morning and in the evening at night without problem .. shower, toilets, small supermarket and small bar

title: (38005) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 5 Avenida la Constitución
title_short: (38005) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 5 Avenida la Constitución
description: Recently created area for motorhomes. Maximum 48 hours. It does not have any services, so it does not differ in practice from the attached parking. Possibility of accessing the swimming pools of the Maritime Park (paying admission) or visiting the Auditorium or Santa Cruz.

title: (38007) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 6 Calle Ramón Trujillo Torres
title_short: (38007) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 6 Calle Ramón Trujillo Torres
description: Great laundromat

title: (38358) El Pris - 111 Carretera el Pris
description: Large parking lot by the sea. It has public showers in a building here. The natural pool of El Pris can be reached on foot in 3 minutes. There is also a restaurant, pub and supermarket.

title: (38208) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 7 Calle Pintor Jose Aguiar
title_short: (38208) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 7 Calle Pintor Jose Aguiar
description: Very quiet land site, the lord of the door is given the will, so it is guarded.

title: (38206) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 4 Camino Fuente Cañizares
title_short: (38206) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 4 Camino Fuente Cañizares
description: Very quiet parking lot in front of Francisco Peraza stadium for the night, near the municipal market and the city center, trails, pedestrian streets, many restaurants, cafes and shops ... Miss any night party or even have a good week -end stays "one hundred percent recommended"

title: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - TF-1
description: CEPSA Service Station, towards Santa Cruz, in front of the Abades PCAN. It has an area to wash the motorhome with a raised platform. It has a good cafeteria, to make the return home more enjoyable.

title: (38208) La Laguna - 3 Calle Concepcion Salazar
description: Street parking with shade (nice trees on top), next to park and not far walking from la laguna center

title: (38201) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 11 Avenida de la República Argentina
title_short: (38201) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 11 Avenida de la República Argentina
description: Dirt parking next to a nice park that includes games for children, climbing, skate park, BMX pump track circuit. It is 900 meters from the cathedral of La Laguna. Car noise until 21/21: 30 then quite quiet

title: (38003) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 31 Avenida la Constitución
title_short: (38003) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 31 Avenida la Constitución
description: Simple parking space without service. Perfect as a starting point for a city tour. The main sites within walking distance. We stayed here for a few hours during the day with no restrictions and assuming staying overnight would be no problem. The place itself is not very interesting to see. But you have a good view of the impressive city theater.

title: (38003) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 4 Calle de Bravo Murillo
title_short: (38003) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 4 Calle de Bravo Murillo
description: Parking, wide and easy to maneuver for larger motorhomes. Very central. Illuminated and safe area. Quiet, although in the morning you may be woken by the tram or traffic. At night it is usually empty, during the day it is usually difficult to find parking.

title: (38588) La Listada - 15 Calle Alcalde Francisco Morales Hernández
title_short: (38588) La Listada - 15 Calle Alcalde Francisco Morales Hernández
description: Ample parking lots, with streets in good condition where overnight stays are allowed.

title: (38588) La Jaca -
description: Nice little dirt parking lot away from everything and very quiet. Nice views too. It is close the Horse Rescue Center so you could stay there overnight and visit the center the day after. You need to reserve you time slot for the visit thoug so be sure you contact them earlier.

title: (38414) - 2 Barranco Ruiz
description: Recreational area with barbecues and tables and drinking water

title: (38588) La Jaca - 1 Calle Alcalde Eladio Morales Borges
title_short: (38588) La Jaca - 1 Calle Alcalde Eladio Morales Borges
description: Land clearing, almost completely leveled. There are no services. On the first line, with a natural pool next to it. To date, overnight stays have been allowed, as long as one is respectful. Restaurants close to good pre go and quality.

title: (38006) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 3 Diseminado Resto Macizo Anaga
title_short: (38006) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 3 Diseminado Resto Macizo Anaga
description: It's a lovely place to park and take a break, with lovely views over La Laguna and a picnic area with wooden tables. Forbidden to stay the night

title: (38208) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 97 Camino Mesa Mota
title_short: (38208) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 97 Camino Mesa Mota
description: Mesa mota - very quiet place

title: (38002) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 28 Calle de la Rosa
title_short: (38002) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 28 Calle de la Rosa
description: Laundry with 4 machines + one for pet stuff.  Payment in cash or by card. Opening times: 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily

title: (38593) El Rio - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near climbing area. If no wind then its a nice place to stay overnight. Quiet, no facilities.

title: (38420) San Juan de la Rambla - 7 TF-5
title_short: (38420) San Juan de la Rambla - 7 TF-5
description: Service road to the right side heading south. Good view of the town from above.

title: (38588) La Jaca - Unnamed Road
description: Approach at the top of the last house. Is feasible for normal cars. No service, please take everything back with you so that everyone can enjoy parking longer...

title: (38280) Tegueste - 141 Carretera General a Punta Hidalgo
title_short: (38280) Tegueste - 141 Carretera General a Punta Hidalgo
description: We asked for permission and they let us pour gray water into a grate in the suction area.

name: Campamentos Punta Del Sordo
title: (38588) Campamentos Punta Del Sordo
description: The campsite stretches down to a small beach area. The site includes several tent and van areas. Several toilets and showers distributed. Public area with bar and play facilities available. Access via gravel road. First impression: nice staff. Since the campsite was occupied in the lower zones, we got a parking space above the area. Possibly more recommendable than down towards the beach. Less occupancy by other campers and clean shared showers / toilets

title: (38280) Tegueste - 198 Carretera General a Punta Hidalgo
title_short: (38280) Tegueste - 198 Carretera General a Punta Hidalgo
description: Speed Queen Self-Service Laundromat

title: () Tegueste -
description: Very nice viewpoint, with the mountains behind and several places to park. It has no facilities but is great for camping

title: (38280) Tegueste - 16 Calle General Mola
description: Public parking, slightly oblique. No services (not even a garbage can), but lit. In the evening some young people with music, but quiet at night. Above the stone wall a public toilet and a little further sports facilities (dogs prohibited sign) and a playground. Gas station on the road.

title: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Unnamed Road
description: 4x4 passable beach section in a small river valley. Visited it from the campsite. not possible with our marco polo. various terraces with space to spread out. well hidden. easily feasible with the right vehicle.

title: (38300) - Cañadas del Teide
description: Las Cañadas National Park, at the foot of Teide, on the access road to the Parador Nacinal. Parking is allowed, but not camping.

title: (38434) Icod de los Vinos - Pista El Lagar
title_short: (38434) Icod de los Vinos - Pista El Lagar
description: El Lagar camping area. Important to ask permission to spend the night at the Cabildo de Tenerife, Free, Perfect for sleeping under the stars and hiking. The access road is not suitable for large motorhomes. There are showers.

title: (38001) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 13 Avenida Profesor Peraza Ayala
title_short: (38001) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 13 Avenida Profesor Peraza Ayala
description: Just a parking lot in a quiet street in front of hotels. supermarket and shops nearby

title: (38429) Las Aguas - 18 Calle la Destila
description: A pretty spot overlooking the sea with 20 or more parking spaces for cars with 3 or 4 suitable for LWB campers . I accessed it with a 5.9 mtr Rv with the width of a fiat Ducato . Nice restaurants and a mini market in location

title: (38260) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 90 Carretera General Tejina
title_short: (38260) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 90 Carretera General Tejina
description: BP water station

title: (38300) La Orotava -
description: Parking next to the Roques de García and which ends at the roulette viewpoint. Starting point for several trails in the region. Lots of movement throughout the day. On a slight slope.

title: (38001) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - S/N Avenida Francisco la Roche
title_short: (38001) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - S/N Avenida Francisco la Roche
description: Gas station on the road you have a machine called agua.

title: (38270) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 142 Camino la Barranquera
title_short: (38270) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 142 Camino la Barranquera
description: Nice level gravel place located directly at the swimming pool. In 2020 because of Corona, the showers were closed. Narrow access but possible with a Ducato box.

title: (38588) San Miguel de Tajao - 7 Calle Callao Hondo
title_short: (38588) San Miguel de Tajao - 7 Calle Callao Hondo
description: Nice parking lot right by the sea. Several very good restaurants nearby. Garbage disposal available. Wonderful.

title: (38440) La Guancha - 12 Avenida Hipólito Sinforiano
description: Clean water. Dump black and grey water. High pressure cleaning. Vacuumcleaner

name: Agro Camping Invernaderito
title: (38260) Agro Camping Invernaderito
description: Nice campsite with bathrooms with shower, toilet and sink. There is a kitchen for general use, a lounge with, for example, table football and books. You can also buy drinks here. The beach and the next town are about 15 minutes away on foot. The campsite is in a plantation and is very idyllic. You can also rent accommodation and tents here. Everyone is extremely friendly. We only see you cleaning and the Covid19 rules are taken into account. Ie mask is worn and there is disinfectant everywhere. There are many animals here that sweeten the day. A great place! Simple but clean. The washing machine and dryer can be used here for a fee. This is also all very clean!

title: (38440) La Guancha - 34 Calle Las Eras
description: Possibility to park 2 vans… if you are in a tent it is perfect, soft ground!

title: (38001) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Av de Anaga
title_short: (38001) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Av de Anaga
description: CEPSA service station with water filling machine

title: (38150) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Avenida de Anaga
title_short: (38150) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Avenida de Anaga
description: Several free parking spaces near the Capitanía Marítima overlooking the harbor. Beach nearby.

title: (38420) San Juan de la Rambla - 9 Calle Antonio Ruiz Cedrés
title_short: (38420) San Juan de la Rambla - 9 Calle Antonio Ruiz Cedrés
description: Peaceful sand parking with lots of spots to park. Nearby is a natural sea pool. Rubbish bins can be found up of th stairs from sea pool.

title: (38293) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 148A Carretera al Monte las Mercedes
title_short: (38293) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 148A Carretera al Monte las Mercedes
description: Small parking lot at the entrance of the city. Nice view over the valley.

title: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 2 Calle Playa
title_short: (38588) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 2 Calle Playa
description: Nice place near the beach. with showers. picnic area. park for children and a small soccer field. all on the same beach. supermarket two steps away. ideal to spend the day.

title: (38260) La Laguna - 23 Camino Playa de Jover
title_short: (38260) La Laguna - 23 Camino Playa de Jover
description: Small dirt parking lot at the mouth of a ravine. A quiet place with houses nearby, therefore it is preferable to respect the place.

title: (38260) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 1 Camino Playa de Jover
title_short: (38260) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 1 Camino Playa de Jover
description: Parquing next to the natural pool of Tejina. There is a fresh water shower and a portable toilet. Without more services. Calm

title: (38180) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 13 TF-11
description: LPG available, ask at checkout for service.

title: (38294) San Cristóbal de La Laguna -
description: Incredible night spent there at jardin mirador. We were not sure we could spend the night there but we were there alone in a very quiet and beautiful spot. The day after a local women came to prepare her small shop for tourist and told us she did not think it was prohibited. Views on teide, sea and cities.

title: (38293) Las Mercedes -
description: Pedro Alvarez picnic area. The water is not drinkable. The toilets were open and clean. One lane road. During the rainy season we have found a few stones that have fallen from the mountain.

title: (38294) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - TF-12
title_short: (38294) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - TF-12
description: Llano los viejos. Beautiful place in the countryside with picnic area, mini playground and toilet. Water available. Departure for a ride to Cruz del Carmen and the Sens trail. Quiet. We spent the night without problem. It is near the mirador da jardina

title: (38619) Granadilla de Abona -
description: Beach area a little complicated to enter to swim but the days are quiet, without disturbing anyone, to access there is a dirt road that is not in good condition but it passes without problem, there is a good atmosphere with people who spend the night in the place, 5 minutes walk there are several very good restaurants a sandy beach with showers and a small supermarket

title: (38250) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 3 Calle La Arena
title_short: (38250) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - 3 Calle La Arena
description: Quiet place to sleep

title: (38250) Bajamar - 14 Urbanizacion Colonia Riego
description: Quiet parking with sea view, not recommended in strong wind

title: (38250) Bajamar - 103 Carretera General de Bajamar
description: Non-potable water

title: (38180) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 11 Calle Déniz
title_short: (38180) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 11 Calle Déniz
description: There is a fountain with a tap where you can fill up with totally drinkable water. It comes naturally from the ravine.

title: (38294) La Laguna - 2 Barrio Cruz Carmen
description: There is a restaurant and it is the starting point for many walks, I recommend visiting them for the sunset. There is a terrace from which you can enjoy a spectacular view. For the night it is a quiet place, we were only 2 vans.

title: (38300) La Orotava - Carretera de las Cañadas del Teide
title_short: (38300) La Orotava - Carretera de las Cañadas del Teide
description: Perfect, large parking lot with spectacular views. Easily passable and relatively flat. Busy with tourists during the day, very quiet in the evening. Also an ideal starting point for hikes.

address.street: Carretera de las Cañadas del Teide

title: (38250) Bajamar - 39 Avenida Gran Poder
description: Parking lot close to the piscina natural (toilets and showers). Very quiet, only a few cars coming and going.

title: (38250) Bajamar - 4-6 Avenida Gran Poder
description: Nice natural pool with public warm showers & toilets  under the walkway

title: (38441) La Guancha - 6 Calle Charco Verde
description: Parking with beautiful views and swimming in a natural pool between the cliffs. We slept very quietly there. The access is quite narrow ... No toilet or shower

name: DISA Central
title: (38611) DISA Central
description: The only way on Tenerife to fill German gas bottles! Simply park to the side of the factory gate, hand over the bottles to the porter and get the filled gas bottles back after about 15 minutes.

title: (38120) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 2 Calle Via Servicio Darsena P
title_short: (38120) Santa Cruz de Tenerife - 2 Calle Via Servicio Darsena P
description: Station service avec possibilité de remplir l’eau. 1€ pour 5mn. Avec 2€, on a rempli un réservoir de 80 L.

title: (38600) Granadilla - 14 Calle el Brocal
description: Picnic area there is drinking water every day from 08 to 20 you can not sleep

title: (38613) Vilaflor - TF-21
description: Bivouac at the entrance of the Village, near a restaurant.  Simple but quiet stop for one night, to help out due to the ban on camping in the Teide park.

title: (38613) Vilaflor - 6 Calle Castaños
description: Large free parking and very quiet sheltered from the looks in the upper part of Vilaflor. Ideal to spend a night before going hiking on the trails towards Teide

title: (38612) Granadilla - Unnamed Road
description: Large area of land, you usually see many vans during the day and less at night, very quiet area. No problem to be both day and night. Near the south airport

title: (38240) Punta del Hidalgo - 93B Carretera General Punta del Hidalgo
title_short: (38240) Punta del Hidalgo - 93B Carretera General Punta del Hidalgo
description: Right next to the beach, very quiet and lots of space in the evenings from 20:00

title: (38613) Vilaflor - 8 Calle la Ladera
description: Dirt parking in front of the Vilaflor football field. Quite flat, with a picnic area and the starting point for hiking trails.

title: (38613) Vilaflor, Santa Cruz de Tenerife - TF-21
title_short: (38613) Vilaflor, Santa Cruz de Tenerife - TF-21
description: Wonderful view of the Teide park mountains, nearby Brifor barracks but no worries, they made us feel comfortable and even helped us take pictures.

name: Camping Punta del Hidalgo
title: (38240) Camping Punta del Hidalgo
description: Camping Punta del Hidalgo. Very nice location, the campsite looks neat. Unfortunately, the campsite is only open on weekends and in summer (see photo dates for 2022)

title: (38677) Adeje - TF-21
description: Las Lajas Park. This is a campsite controlled by the Cabildo de Tenerife and you must ask permission to camp on the website. A very quiet place in the pine forest. It can get chilly at night at 2000m altitude. Toilet and drinking water available. There are no lights, so a big starry sky. BBQ picnic areas are also available.

title: (38434) Icod de los Vinos - 67 Camino Real
title_short: (38434) Icod de los Vinos - 67 Camino Real
description: Gas station with water filling facility (no drinking water)

title: (38617) - 21A Avenida Llano Verde
description: Karavan camper is THE store if you're looking for a repsol tank ( butane or propane) and an adapter,they have almost all you need for your camper/ van. No need of an address with them! Great service, highly recommend!

title: (38294) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - Unnamed Road
title_short: (38294) San Cristóbal de La Laguna - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking in front of church. Great view, 10 min walk to wonderful viewpoint (mirador de aguaide). We spent here one night without any problem. At night the parking is almost empty. There is a bar-restaurant in front of the parking. Attention - last few kilometers (from las carboneras) to parking the road is very narrow
